assignment4

Class BoundedBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment4.BoundedBuffer

  • public class BoundedBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    Buffer class that contains a bounded buffer and handles a series of strings from the writer that will be modified by the modifier and read by the reader.
    Author:
    Mikael Lindfors

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BoundedBuffer.BufferStatus

      Method not used at the moment.
      void modify()
      Method that search for a specific string (word) and replace it with another string from user input.

      Method that reads data from the buffer if its not empty or the buffer' contains no slots where the modifier has analyzed.

      Method not used at the moment.

      • BoundedBuffer

        public BoundedBuffer(int maxCapacity,
                     java.lang.String findString,
                     java.lang.String replaceString)
        Constructor that takes input from the GUI and also sets all enums to Empty in bufferStatus.
        Parameters:
        maxCapacity - int max positions in queue.
        findString - String that will be search for by the modifier.
        replaceString - String that will replace all matching strings found by modifier.
